data.title: Initiatives, Referendums, Referrals and Recall
data.meta_description: Find information on initiatives, referendums and referrals including how to be a chief petitioner, make or change a law and more.
data.text:
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Petition 2024-001​

Prospective petition was filed on September 29, 2021. To begin the ballot title drafting process, chief petitioners must submit 1,000 sponsorship signatures.

Subject Provided by Chief Petitioner

School Choice Amendment ( view complete text of Initiative​​)

Chief Petitioner

Marc Thielman 34392 Garoutte Road, Cottage Grove, OR 97424​

11/23/2021 Sponsorship signatures submitted for verification.​

12/08/2021 Signature verification of sponsorship signatures completed. Petition contains 1,776 signatures.​

Draft Ballot Title

Comments

​

01/19/2022 Rejected based on the advice from the Attorney General​​​
